verbose_text: Ischaemia-reperfusion myocardial injury and hypoxia models have shown that the expression of autophagy related protein Beclin-1 may be increased in cardiomyocytes and that the level of HIF-1alpha in cardiomyocytes may be inhibited, decreasing the expression of autophagy related protein Beclin-1 and reducing the level of autophagy in cardiomyocytes.
evidence: injury and hypoxia models have shown that the expression of autophagy-related protein Beclin-1 may be increased in cardiomyocytes and that the level of HIF-1alpha in cardiomyocytes may be inhibited, decreasing the expression of autophagy-related protein Beclin-1 and reducing the level of autophagy
